name: Food Block Madness
description:
** RECENT UPDATE! **

for level 2 after you defeated the boss, the door to exit will ask 3 strawberries to exit (sorry i forgot to fix that)  if you have more than 3 strawberries, just simply make a milkshake of those extra ones, until you have the right amount! thank you enjoy

PLAY THE HTML VERSION! IT WORKS THE WINDOWS VERSION DOESNT

Instructions are on the game, BUT! just in case:

move left and right - A & D or ARROW KEYS

JUMP: SPACE OR UP ARROW

when you are on the 1st boss stage:

to aim gun: mouse cursor

to shoot: LMB - left mouse button

Music by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi).
